item.title: 美国消费者信心因就业和收入担忧略有下降
item.description: 由于对就业和收入的担忧加剧，8 月份美国消费者信心下降。【原文：US consumer confidence fell in August on more concerns regarding jobs and income.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）季度快报显示美国贷款人纸面损失减少
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp）发布的季度报告显示，第二季度美国银行的票据损失有所缓解，存款保险基金的余额也有所上升。【原文：Paper losses at US banks eased in the second quarter and the bedrock deposit insurance fund’s balance ticked higher, according to a quarterly report by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构称将加强对私人市场的审查
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管机构表示，它将加强对私人市场的监控，因为它的目标是风险最大的金融服务领域。【原文：Australia’s corporate regulator said it will boost surveillance of private markets as it targets areas of financial services that present the greatest risks.】

item.title: 特朗普抨击美联储库克令交易员不安，美国股市动荡不安
item.description: 周二，美国股市在小幅上涨和下跌之间徘徊，受到债券收益率上升的压力，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统解雇美联储理事的决定再次引发了人们对央行独立性的担忧。【原文：US stocks shuffled between small gains and losses on Tuesday, pressured by a rise in bond yields as President Donald Trump’s decision to fire a Federal Reserve governor revived concerns about the central bank’s independence.】

item.title: 瑞士经济部要求瑞银在美国关税问题上提供支持
item.description: 瑞士经济部正在寻求瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的意见，因为该集团正努力争取改善美国的贸易协议，这有可能为瑞士最大的贷款机构提供一条与政府改善关系的途径。【原文：The Swiss economy ministry is seeking input from UBS Group AG as it scrambles to get an improved US trade deal, potentially providing the country’s largest lender an avenue for better ties with the government.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体与 Crypto.com 合作成立加密货币财政公司
item.description: Trump Media & Technology Group Corp.和 Crypto.com 同意与空白支票载体 Yorkville Acquisition Corp.达成协议，创建一家加密货币财务公司，专注于购买和持有 Cronos 生态系统的原生加密货币 CRO 代币。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. and Crypto.com agreed to a deal with blank-check vehicle Yorkville Acquisition Corp. to create a crypto treasury company focused on buying and holding CRO tokens, the native cryptocurrency token of the Cronos ecosystem.】

item.title: 贝莱德、纽文将退出波多黎各公用事业公司债务交易
item.description: 贝莱德财务管理公司（BlackRock Financial Management）、富兰克林顾问公司（Franklin Advisers）和纽文资产管理公司（Nuveen Asset Management）等投资者计划终止一项削减波多黎各破产电力公司债务的协议，因为特朗普政府本月解雇了负责监督波多黎各岛财务的董事会除一名成员外的所有成员。【原文：BlackRock Financial Management, Franklin Advisers and Nuveen Asset Management are among investors planning to end a deal that would cut the debt of Puerto Rico’s bankrupt power utility after the Trump administration this month fired all but one member of the board that oversees the island’s finances.】

item.title: 高盛和德意志银行称市场夏季平静期已过
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：A “Goldilocks summer” is all but over, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc., and mounting concern about the US economy is yanking markets from their seasonal slumber.】

item.title: Eldridge Capital 新私募股权融资基金目标 10 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃尔德里奇资本管理公司（Eldridge Capital Management）正在筹建一支新基金，该基金将利用私募股权交易持续低迷的时机。【原文：Eldridge Capital Management is pitching a new fund that will take advantage of the ongoing drought in private equity dealmaking, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 埃尔多安将参加阿塞尔桑发布会，推动土耳其国防事业发展
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安将出席由国有国防承包商 Aselsan Elektronik Sanayi Ve Ticaret AS 经营的一个新项目的奠基仪式。【原文：Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan is set to attend the groundbreaking ceremony of a new project run by state-owned defense contractor Aselsan Elektronik Sanayi Ve Ticaret AS, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 卢特尼克建议美国在英特尔交易后关注国防工业
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示，在美国获得芯片制造商英特尔公司（Intel Corp.【原文：US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick suggested the government is looking at the defense sector and other industries for potential stakes in companies after an unorthodox deal that saw the US obtain a 10% share in chipmaker Intel Corp.】

item.title: 布雷纳德称美联储银行行长面临被特朗普撤职的风险
item.description: 前美联储副主席莱尔-布雷纳德（Lael Brainard）表示，由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的政治操作，明年美联储多位地区银行行长被免职的风险确实存在。【原文：Former Federal Reserve Vice Chair Lael Brainard suggested there’s a real risk of multiple Fed district bank presidents getting removed from office next year as a result of politically charged maneuvering by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 激进投资者 Fivespan 参股《纽约时报
item.description: 三年前在纽约时报公司领导了一场备受瞩目的激进主义运动的金融家们，现在通过他们的新投资公司入股了这家标志性的报业公司。【原文：The financiers that led a high-profile activist campaign at the New York Times Co. three years ago have now taken a stake in the iconic newspaper company via their new investment firm.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴升级视频人工智能模型，与全球竞争对手并驾齐驱
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）更新了其开源视频生成模型，持续加快人工智能改进步伐，以赶上中国和美国的竞争对手。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. has updated its open-source video-generating model, sustaining a frenetic pace of AI enhancements to stay abreast of Chinese and US rivals.】

item.title: 土耳其财富基金计划 9 月出售美元债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，土耳其财富基金正在与国际贷款机构洽谈，探讨在 9 月份发行美元债券的可能性。【原文：The Turkish wealth fund is in talks with international lenders to explore a potential dollar debt issuance in September, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国核心资本货物订单增长，超出所有预测
item.description: 美国 7 月份的商业设备订单增幅超过预期，表明随着贸易和税收政策的一些不确定性逐渐减弱，企业正在推进投资计划。【原文：US orders for business equipment increased in July by more than projected, suggesting companies are moving forward on investment plans as some of the trade and tax policy uncertainty gradually diminishes.】

item.title: 铃木汽车将在印度投资 80 亿美元，开始生产电动汽车
item.description: 铃木汽车公司首席执行官铃木敏弘（Toshihiro Suzuki）表示，该公司计划在印度投资超过 7000 亿卢比（约合 80 亿美元），这表明随着日本汽车制造商进军电动汽车生产领域，印度对该公司的重要性与日俱增。【原文：Suzuki Motor Corp. plans to invest over 700 billion rupees ($8 billion) in India, Chief Executive Officer Toshihiro Suzuki said, underscoring the country’s growing importance for the Japanese automaker as it forays into electric vehicles production.】

item.title: 巴西年度通胀因食品和汽油价格降低而降温
item.description: 由于食品和运输成本降低，巴西的年度通胀率在 8 月初有所放缓，在央行承诺维持高利率的情况下，这对消费者的宽慰有限。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation slowed in early August on cheaper food and transportation costs, offering limited relief to consumers as the central bank pledges to keep interest rates high.】

item.title: 特朗普向风力发电场开战，撕毁规则手册
item.description:
美国政府反对在美国东海岸开展离岸项目的举措增加了投资者的风险。【原文：

The administration’s moves against offshore projects on the US East Coast heighten the risks for investors.

item.title: 雅苒股价上涨，与巴斯夫的美国蓝色氨项目被取消
item.description: 雅苒国际股份公司（Yara International ASA）和巴斯夫公司（BASF SE）放弃了在美国墨西哥湾沿岸开发低碳合成氨生产设施的项目，这使得这家在奥斯陆上市的化肥公司股价走高。【原文：Yara International ASA and BASF SE are abandoning a project to develop a low-carbon ammonia production facility on the US Gulf Coast, sending shares of the Oslo-listed fertilizer company higher.】

item.title: 匈牙利央行坚持谨慎政策，维持关键利率不变
item.description: 匈牙利央行的借贷成本保持在欧盟最高水平，决策者优先考虑货币稳定，而不是过早放松货币政策的潜在风险。【原文：Hungary’s central bank maintained the European Union’s highest borrowing costs, with policymakers prioritizing currency stability to the potential risk of premature monetary easing.】

item.title: Aris 与非正规矿工合作，引领哥伦比亚非法黄金热潮
item.description: 哥伦比亚的手工采矿者正在通过一些不同寻常的协议，帮助弗兰克-朱斯特拉支持的一家加拿大贵金属生产商在该国的非法黄金热潮中捞一把。【原文：Colombia’s artisanal miners are helping a Canadian precious metals producer backed by Frank Giustra navigate the country’s illicit gold boom via some unusual agreements.】

item.title: 中美计划举行会谈，玉米收于近一个月高位
item.description: 随着中国政府的一位高级谈判代表前往美国，玉米价格接近一个月高点，一旦贸易谈判取得成功，对美国农作物的需求将会增加。【原文：Corn held near a one-month high as a top Chinese government negotiator heads to the US, raising the specter of increased demand for American crops should the trade talks prove successful.】

item.title: 咖啡因担忧近期涨势导致价格膨胀而下跌
item.description: 在纽约，咖啡期货连续第二天下滑，缩减了八天上涨的部分涨幅，一些投资者认为这是过度上涨。【原文：Coffee futures slipped for a second day in New York, paring back part of an eight-day advance that some investors viewed as excessive.】

item.title: 据说 IT 公司 Aces 将在沙特推动数字化进程之际考虑出售股权
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，总部位于沙特阿拉伯的先进通信与电子系统公司（Advanced Communications and Electronics Systems Co.【原文：Saudi Arabia-based Advanced Communications and Electronics Systems Co. is weighing a stake sale, people familiar with the matter said, a deal that would give buyers exposure to the kingdom’s growing demand for digital infrastructure services.】

item.title: 中石油拟斥资 400 亿元收购储气库公司
item.description: 中国石油天然气股份有限公司（PetroChina Co.）【原文：PetroChina Co. has proposed buying three natural gas storage companies for 40 billion yuan ($5.6 billion).】

item.title: 斯里兰卡前总统因滥用资金被捕后获保释
item.description: 斯里兰卡前总统拉尼尔-维克拉马辛哈（Ranil Wickremesinghe）因被指控在2023年担任国家元首期间滥用政府资金而自8月22日起被关押，后获保释。【原文：Sri Lanka’s former President Ranil Wickremesinghe was released on bail after being held in custody since Aug. 22 on allegations he misused government funds while head of state in 2023.】

item.title: 德国国防科技的进步以及阻碍其发展的因素
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，克里斯蒂娜-基里亚索格洛（Christina Kyriasoglou）将回顾德国的最新发展，在德国，国防开支不再是禁忌。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Christina Kyriasoglou reviews recent developments in Germany, where spending on defense is no longer taboo.】

item.title: 香港豪宅今年创下 1.4 亿美元的拍卖纪录
item.description: 香港一栋新豪宅以 10.9 亿港元（1.4 亿美元）的价格售出，成为这个金融中心今年最昂贵的房屋成交价。【原文：A new mansion in Hong Kong sold for HK$1.09 billion ($140 million), the most expensive home sale in the financial hub this year.】

item.title: 据称法国巴黎银行将聘请华泰的蒋锡培领导中国股票出售交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国巴黎银行已聘请华泰证券股份有限公司的Doris Jiang领导该行在中国的股权资本市场交易。【原文：BNP Paribas SA has hired Huatai Securities Co.’s Doris Jiang to lead Chinese equity capital market deals for the French bank, according to people familiar with the matter.】
